section.heading: Proceedings governed by other law.
section.text: This chapter does not govern a proceeding pertaining to:

para.text: The authorization of emergency medical care for a child;
An adoption proceeding pursuant to § 16-301; or
A proceeding to adjudicate the parentage of a child pursuant to § 16-909(b-2).

annoGroup.heading: Effect of Amendments
annoGroup.annotation: The 2013 amendment by D.C. Law 19-233 rewrote the section.

annoGroup.heading: Editor's Notes
annoGroup.annotation: Uniform Law: This section is based upon § 103 of the Uniform Child Custody Jurisdiction and Enforcement Act (1997 Act).
